fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Create a GIM Subgame using all players who were alive at the start of this game. Each player will have the same role as in the main game, but subgame deaths will not reveal roles or causes of death.
- Attack a player every third night in a subgame.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Subgame winners will gain 1-use Powerful Defense, losers die to Powerful Attacks.
- The main game's night will only end after the subgame ends.
- If the X win the subgame, they instantly win the main game too. The main game can continue as long as at least two other opposing neutrals/factions are alive.
- You can only create a subgame as early as night 3, and you can only do so once.
- You can't create a subgame in a subgame.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: X Goal OR win the subgame.
